trans-unit.source: It is non-obstrusive and easy to plug.
trans-unit.target: 邪魔にならず、差し込むのも簡単です。

trans-unit.source: This cube provides an implementation of the Remember Me, so users don’t have to login again when they come back later.
trans-unit.target: This cube provides an implementation of the Remember Me, so users don’t have to login again when they come back later.

trans-unit.source: implementation of the Remember Me feature for the CubicWeb framework
trans-unit.target: CubicWebフレームワークのRemember Me機能の実装
